items.title: SaaS Revenue & Exit Planning
items.challenge: Subscription business preparing for acquisition needed comprehensive ARR model, cohort analysis, and investor-ready financial package for due diligence.
items.build: Built multi-year ARR projection model with cohort tracking, MRR waterfall, expansion/contraction metrics, and scenario planning. Created data room materials including historical financials, KPI dashboards, and forward-looking statements.
items.impact: Model supported company valuation during due diligence process. Finance team reduced forecast preparation from 4+ hours to <15 minutes. Strategic angle: Prepared comprehensive materials for strategic buyers.

items.title: Post-Acquisition Integration
items.challenge: Post-merger consolidation across 15 entities required standardized reporting, intercompany eliminations, and synergy tracking. Manual Excel process created delays and errors.
items.build: Python + CSV/SQL ingestion system with validation checks, automated intercompany eliminations, and consolidated reporting workbook. Built synergy tracking dashboard to monitor integration milestones.
items.impact: Reduced monthly close cycle from ~10 hours to ~30 minutes with auditable checks. Identified $XXX in operational synergies within first 90 days. Strategic angle: Quantified merger value creation for board reporting.

items.title: Growth Scenario Planning
items.challenge: Board and investors needed scenario analysis for growth strategies, but static spreadsheets made testing assumptions slow and error-prone.
items.build: Driver-based scenario model with sensitivity inputs, waterfall analysis, and one-click scenario switching. Automated executive summary generation for board decks. Built 20+ pre-configured scenarios (base, upside, downside, stress test).
items.impact: Board can now evaluate scenarios in real-time during meetings. Scenario runtime reduced from hours to seconds. Strategic angle: Model supported Series X fundraising discussions with quantified growth paths.

items.title: Real Estate Syndication Model
items.challenge: Real estate syndications required complex IRR calculations, LP/GP waterfall structures, and sensitivity analysis across multiple deals. Needed investor-grade reporting.
items.build: Excel-based syndication model with IRR calculations, preferred return waterfalls, GP promote structures, and cash distribution schedules. Built sensitivity tables for leverage, exit timing, and appreciation assumptions. Automated investor quarterly reports.
items.impact: Modeled $5M+ in syndication deals with investor-ready materials. Sensitivity analysis identified optimal leverage structures. Strategic angle: Enabled sponsor to present multiple deal structures to LPs with confidence.

items.title: Commission Tracking & Comp Alignment
items.challenge: Complex commission structures with multiple tiers, accelerators, and adjustments created reconciliation issues and misalignment with growth targets.
items.build: Structured Excel model with clear tier logic, automated adjustment flags, audit trail, and printable commission statements. Built scenario planning tool to test comp plan changes before rollout.
items.impact: Commission disputes decreased significantly. Finance team reduced monthly comp cycle by 60%. Strategic angle: Aligned sales compensation with strategic growth targets through scenario testing before plan changes.
